decision_conditions: The proposed development is of a poor design and would be discordant and highly prominent when viewed from neighbouring properties and the streetscene and would not respect the character of the existing dwelling or the wider area, causing harm to the character and appearance of the dwellings and wider area. The proposed development is therefore contrary to Policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012), the Residential Design SPD (2013) and the NPPF (2023).
